EmailTemplate.name: ASI GiftBox Request Notify HR
EmailTemplate.subject: Gift Box request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been submitted by {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A new Gift Box request ({!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name}) has been submitted by {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName}.
Please click on the link {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Link} to review.
